long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DeleteTweets-- a powerful plugin with key features:

1ã€Delete  Tweet/ReTweet/Reply/Like
2ã€Filter tweets with ease by time, keywords, and engagement, plus custom conditions
3ã€Backup all tweets and archive deleted ones effortlessly.
4ã€Export all backups with ease.
5ã€Fully automated search and deletion.

ğŸ How it works
1ã€Choose Tweet Type: Select the type of tweets to delete - tweet, retweet, like, or reply.
2ã€Set Filtering Criteria: Define specific criteria for filtering your tweets.
3ã€One-Click Deletion: Effortlessly delete all tweets that match your set criteria with just one click.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
DeleteTweets plugin ensures your data security by simulating user deletion actions. It operates exclusively within your browser, eliminating the need for any access to user account information or data. Rest assured, your data remains on your device, debunking any concerns about data privacy.

ğŸ“„Terms
Enjoy all the search, filter, and delete perks without any restrictions on tweet removals as a free user. Upgrade to a Pro account for additional features like exporting deleted tweets or creating backups.  ğŸš€âœ¨

ğŸš¨Alert
High-frequency use of the Twitter API may result in a temporary delay in deletion. Please wait a bit before continuing to remove any remaining tweets.
